mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GAJAE.RESERVATIONS ( USER_ID, P_ID, R_DATE, R_START_DATE, R_END_DATE, R_NAME, R_MOBILE, R_EMAIL, R_PEOPLE, R_ETA, R_PS, R_STATE, PAY_NUMBER, ROOM_ID ) VALUES ( #{USER_ID}, #{P_ID}, NOW(), #{R_START_DATE}, #{R_END_DATE}, #{R_NAME}, #{R_MOBILE}, #{R_EMAIL}, #{R_PEOPLE}, #{R_ETA}, #{R_PS}, #{R_STATE}, #{PAY_NUMBER}, #{ROOM_ID} )
mapper.select:
SELECT R_NUMBER , USER_ID , P_ID , REVIEW_NUMBER , R_DATE , R_UPDATE , R_START_DATE , R_END_DATE , R_NAME , R_MOBILE , R_EMAIL , R_PEOPLE , R_ETA , R_PS , R_STATE , PAY_NUMBER , ROOM_ID FROM GAJAE.RESERVATIONS
AND PAY_NUMBER = #{PAY_NUMBER}

SELECT PAY.PAY_NUMBER, PAY.MERCHANT_NAME, PAY.PAID_AMOUNT, PAY.PG_PROVIDER, PAY.PAID_AT, PAY.RECEIPT_URL, PAY.STATUS, PAY.CURRENCY, RES.R_DATE, RES.R_START_DATE, RES.R_END_DATE, RES.R_NAME, RES.R_MOBILE, RES.R_EMAIL, RES.R_PEOPLE, RES.R_ETA, RES.R_PS, RES.R_STATE, PRO.P_TITLE, PRO.ROOM_ID, PRO.P_STAR, PRO.P_POSTAL, PRO.P_TEL, PRO.P_ADDRESS, PRO.P_CHECKIN, PRO.P_CHECKOUT, PRO.P_MAPY, PRO.P_MAPX, PRO.HOST_BUSINESS_NUM, RT.ROOM_TYPE, RT.ROOM_OPTION, RT.ROOM_CAPACITY FROM PAYMENT PAY INNER JOIN RESERVATIONS RES ON PAY.PAY_NUMBER = RES.PAY_NUMBER INNER JOIN PROPERTIES PRO ON RES.P_ID = PRO.P_ID INNER JOIN P_ROOMTYPE RT ON RES.ROOM_ID = RT.ROOM_ID WHERE PAY.PAY_NUMBER = #{PAY_NUMBER} AND RES.R_NUMBER = #{R_NUMBER} AND PRO.P_ID = #{P_ID} AND PRO.ROOM_ID = #{ROOM_ID} AND RT.ROOM_ID = #{ROOM_ID}
